DPI (payload), Stateful (connection tracking), Stateless (per-packet). Standards: NIST SP 1800-35 (ZTA with micro-segmentation), CIS AWS Foundations Benchmark (Rule 5.3: Network Firewalls), AWS Network Firewall (stateful/DPI/Suricata), Azure NSGs/Flow Logs, GCP Armor, tools: Suricata/Zeek.
